get.description: Retrieves the body of a Webhook Event.
Retrieves WebhookEvents from a single Webhook.
Retrieves a list of all supported Webhook event types.
Retrieves a single WebhookEvent by ID.
Retrieves a Webhook Header by ID.
Retrieves a list of WebhookHeaders by WebhookId.

post.description: Creates a new webhook for the desired event. The remote endpoint must be HTTPS.

delete.description: Deletes All Channel Webhooks. Events will immediately stop posting to this endpoint upon deletion.
Deletes Webhook. Events will immediately stop posting to this endpoint upon deletion.

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook the event occurred on

entity_id.description: ID of entity this event occurred for

attempts.description: Deliver attempts of the webhook the event

webhook_id.description: ID of the webhook the header belongs to

remote_endpoint.description: Remote endpoint the webhook posts against.
